21
22#ifndef UNIX_ERRNO2RESULT_H
23#define UNIX_ERRNO2RESULT_H 1
24
25/*! \file */
26
27/* XXXDCL this should be moved to lib/isc/include/isc/errno2result.h. */
28
29#include <errno.h> /* Provides errno. */
30
31#include <isc/lang.h>
32#include <isc/types.h>
33
34ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
35
36#define isc__errno2result(x) isc___errno2result(x, __FILE__, __LINE__)
37
38isc_result_t
39isc___errno2result(int posixerrno, const char *file, unsigned int line);
40
41ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
42
43#endif /* UNIX_ERRNO2RESULT_H */
